name: Humankind in a nutshell
description:
Hi, I am a uni student interested in creating indie games.

I've been working on this project for last 2 months, 24/7.

This project is heavily inspired by Civilization Series.

Still a lot of work needed, and it's in VERY EARLY stage, but I really want to get some feedbacks about the game in general to see if it is worth to keep working on it.

The game has a very basic tutorial, and the standard stage (playable only until Medieval Era).

Please give it a try and tell me what you think!

Thank you for stopping by!
